title: [Onoir, Court of Chivalry]
description: Moonlight filters through the branches of an ancient elm located in the center of this aesthetic courtyard, reflecting upon the surface of a waterfall fountain along the main cobblestone path.  Carefully tended wildflowers, grasses, and pathways comprise the remaining area, accented by a solitary wooden bench.  The soothing chirping of crickets and the occasional hooting of owls fill the air, a peaceful counterpoint to the stout granite towers equipped with ballistae in each corner of the courtyard.

Sunlight filters through the branches of an ancient elm located in the center of this aesthetic courtyard, reflecting upon the surface of a waterfall fountain along the main cobblestone path.  Carefully tended wildflowers, grasses, and pathways comprise the remaining area, accented by a solitary wooden bench.  The melodious songs of birds and the occasional chatter of squirrels fill the air, a peaceful counterpoint to the stout granite towers equipped with ballistae in each corner of the courtyard.
